entries.name: analytics-agent
entries.intent: Microsoft Fabric analytics architect designing OneLake lakehouses, workspaces, notebooks, and Power BI semantic models across all TVS Holdings entities

entries.name: azure-agent
entries.intent: Azure IaC specialist deploying Bicep templates, managing Key Vault, Azure Functions, Static Web Apps, and App Insights for TVS Holdings

entries.name: browser-fallback-agent
entries.intent: Playwright browser automation agent handling Microsoft portal operations that lack CLI or API coverage, with screenshot verification

entries.name: carrier-normalization-agent
entries.intent: TAIA carrier data orchestrator normalizing carrier names, commission structures, and agent hierarchies for FMO sale preparation

entries.name: client-solution-architect-agent
entries.intent: Client delivery architect translating business goals into phased Microsoft implementation plans and acceptance criteria

entries.name: comms-agent
entries.intent: Teams and Exchange specialist provisioning workspaces, channels, shared mailboxes, and HIPAA-aware communications for TVS Holdings

entries.name: consulting-crm-agent
entries.intent: Consulting CRM specialist managing Lobbi Consulting and Medicare Consulting Dataverse environments with engagement tracking and shared prospects

entries.name: data-agent
entries.intent: Dataverse schema specialist managing tables, columns, relationships, solution packaging, and data migration for TVS and Consulting environments

entries.name: embedded-analytics-agent
entries.intent: Embedded analytics specialist for Power BI embedding, tenant isolation, and application-facing semantic model access

entries.name: excel-automation-agent
entries.intent: Office Scripts and Power Query automation specialist for financial reconciliation and operational workbook pipelines

entries.name: fabric-pipeline-agent
entries.intent: Microsoft Fabric pipeline and notebook operator for ingestion, transformation, and refresh orchestration

entries.name: github-agent
entries.intent: GitHub and CI/CD specialist managing monorepo structure, GitHub Actions workflows, branch policies, and PR automation for TVS Holdings

entries.name: identity-agent
entries.intent: Entra ID specialist managing tenant configurations, conditional access, MFA, YubiKey FIDO2, and license assignments across all TVS Holdings entities

entries.name: ingest-agent
entries.intent: Data ingestion specialist managing Firebase extraction from A3, CSV imports, API data pulls, and ETL pipeline coordination

entries.name: m365-governance-agent
entries.intent: Microsoft 365 governance lead for tenant controls, DLP, retention, and compliance across delivery workstreams

entries.name: michelle-scripts-agent
entries.intent: Office Scripts generator producing TypeScript automation for Excel, Power Automate desktop flows, and data transformation macros for staff

entries.name: planner-orchestrator-agent
entries.intent: Engagement planning orchestrator that sequences specialized Microsoft delivery agents across sale prep and client delivery phases

entries.name: platform-agent
entries.intent: Power Platform specialist managing Dataverse environments, Power Pages, Copilot Studio bots, and solution transport across TVS Holdings entities

entries.name: power-pages-agent
entries.intent: Dedicated Power Pages engineer for portal buildouts, web roles, table permissions, and release governance
